Plot prior distribution

Source: R/plot.prior.R
plot.prior.Rd

This function provides a simple plot method for the prior object class.

Usage

# S3 method for class 'prior'
plot(object, ...)

Arguments

...

additional arguments for hist

x

an prior object class

Examples

# create object containing
# vector of r values
iter <- 1000
mu <- 0.1
cv <- 0.2
sd <- sqrt(log(1+cv^2))
x <- rlnorm(iter,log(mu)-sd^2/2,sd)
r <- prior(x)

# plot
if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
plot(r, xlab = 'r', ylab = '', yaxt = 'n', main = '')
} # }
